column5: Anyone knows how to get to the ramp in Grimsby? Is it any good? Fees?  Never been there but planning to for tomorrow.... Thanks.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
QEW to Christie st exit. Left on Christie, follow to end. Turn right, it becomes Lake 100 yds? on your left is Forans marine.

Thanks Bud...appreciate it. I did Mapquest for Forans Marine and it shows me....Christie to Ontario St. to Lake St.  http://www.mapquest.com/maps?city=Grimsby&...amp;zipcode=L3M Are we talking about the same place?  Cheers, Ice Fsherman
Your map is correct. And so is Bigugli
The offramp in Grimsby is for 3 cross streets:  Ontario st, Christie and Maple. You go through the first cross street and turn left at the second intersection.
There is a free ramp at the end of Elizabeth st at the Forty mile park. It's gets fairly shallow in there at times so not good for large boats.
